full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 MF Fatima Medical Clinic MEDICAL GROUP 820-A South Alvarado Street Los Angeles, CA 90057 Telephone: (213) 384-0604 Fax: (310) 278-8176 March, 2 1999 RE: MATUS MARIA. ALIEN : A092360662 DOB :11-12-14: ANSWER TO QUESTION OF MENTAL DISABILITY OR IMPAIRMENT: Diagnosis of Mental Disability or Impairment: 1. Memory impairment due to : A. Dementia of the Alzheimers' type with depressed mood DSM IV 290.21 B. Senility ICD code 794. C. Age related cognitive decline. DSM III 780.9 PHYSICAL DISABILITY OR IMPAIRMENT: 1. Osteoarthritis lower extremities, both joints and lumbar since 1989 ICD code 714. 2. Constant cephalgia for one year ICD code 7840 3. Hypercholesterolemia, since 1997 ICD code 2720 3. Moderate vision loss, both eyes since 1993. ICD code 369.02 4. Frecuent diarrhea for long time ICD code 0090. 5. Varicose veins both legs for 15 years, ICD code 4540. 6. Moderate hearing loss both ears since 1993. 7. Osteoporosis, unknown date of onset ICD code 733.00 8. Left and right cataract ICD code 366.1 13 since 1994 10: Dizziness for 3 years. 9. Hysterectomy 1995 (thera was a tumor inside of uterus. ) MEDICATIONS: Ibuprofen 600 mg. one bid for osteoarthrosis. exedrine extra strenght one tid for osteoarthritis. Oscal 500 mg. one bid for osteoporosis. Nature: Memory : Patient has poor memory of recents events. Mrs. Matus is inability to learn new information, also disturbances in executive functioning suffering from memory impairment since 1988. She is also suffering from concentrate such as planning, organizing, sequencing and abstracting. The patient cannot of and overall declined her intellectual ability, Patient has symptoms Patient has been loss in her neighborhood. for many years times. lowered self esteem feeling of inadeguacy since 5 depression such as sleep disturbances, feeling of loneliness, slowed speech ORIGEN: Of memory impairment is multiple chronic illnesses as described above ,patient's aging ,and taking a variety of medications. EXTENT: Moderate to severe and persistent deterioration of patient's mental impairment since 3 years ago.
